review.author: DevOps (Codex)
review.findings: PTY write race fix: chunk write→ack barrier before Enter. writeAndWaitAck handshake in daemon-client.js awaits per-chunk daemon.write.ack. Daemon echoes requestedByEventId for matching. pty-handlers.js awaits each chunk sequentially. injection.js aborts on writeChunked failure — sendTrustedEnter never fires if chunks fail. Graceful fallback via writeWithAckIfAvailable. Cleanup on disconnect/timeout. Cross-model: Codex authored, Claude Opus reviewed. 6 new tests.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
